sections.name: Executive Summary
sections.summary:
GMR Airports Ltd, with the symbol GMRAIRPORT.NS, has shown a commendable 30-day stock return of 7.61%, alongside an annualized volatility of 13.98%, indicating relatively stable performance, while the average daily trading volume stands at 11.96 million shares, reflecting robust market interest; additionally, the total traded value in the past 30 days reached ₹ 1,12.43 crore with a total trading volume of 359.51 million shares, all derived from NSE prices as of 14 Nov 2025 11:45.

Keys used: symbol, returns_summary.30_day_stock_return_percent, risk_metrics.volatility_30d_annualized_percent, liquidity.avg_daily_volume, liquidity.total_traded_value_cr_30d, liquidity.total_traded_volume_30d, timestamp
